website_summaries.verdict: The CVO version of the vintage Keds Champion Leather has remained genuine to its ancestor by delivering comfort and conservative yet stylish kick that could be mixed and matched with any attire. It features all the classic elements with enhanced durability and versatility yet Keds fell short in updating this shoe's mediocre arch support. Nonetheless, most buyers and bystanders still admire the classic look of the Keds Champion Leather CVO that displays only the essentials.
pros: The Keds Champion Leather CVO is found at an affordable price range
Buyers can choose from the multiple colorways offered in the market
The greater number of the reviewers revealed that this shoe is very comfortable
The unfussy look of this model boosts its versatility, shared many reviewers
Some buyers applauded that they could wear and style this sneaker, painlessly
Thus, some recommended this for traveling
This pair runs true to size
Few noted that this pair is easy to maintain and clean
A large percentage of the reviewers highly recommended this kick to their peers
Quite a few reviewers suggested the Keds Champion Leather CVO for the all-day use
The lightness of this model has been praised several times in the review section
A couple of ladies admired the slim profile of this footwear that gives a slender illusion of their feet
This model is presented in medium and wide widths
cons: Several reviewers complained that the Keds Champion Leather CVO has insufficient arch support
Some buyers griped that this pair runs tad narrow

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but not for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these a few years ago for school and loved them! When work told me I needed to have smart shoes, I got another pair straight away and they fit the bill. However I think I wore them a bit too much, as all day on my feet wore literally right through the bottom of them (you could see my footprint through the bottom for a long while before it went) and the base came apart and let water in after about 4 months of use. As an occasional shoe I don't have an issue but not sturdy enough for lots of walking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and versatile Keds
customer_reviews.text: second pair i have now purchased and they are really comfortable. Do not rub sole of your foot like cheaper brands. They look good with pants or a dress so are versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Ms L Boocker

customer_reviews.title: Low back
customer_reviews.text: Slips around on my feet, I have wide feet though so may fit those of more average shape. Soles are comfy. Can see why they are the nurses choice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wrycraft

customer_reviews.title: Great school shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter for school. The fit is great and they have lasted really well. They arrived very promptly and were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: jenda3

customer_reviews.title: Buy Buy Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use within a hospital- super comfy when on your feet all day! Good quality, have had them a few months now & still looking as good as New! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish in soft leather, so suitable for any weather. Good price too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Keds I have bought for my 14 year old daughter. She wears them to school and thinks they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fiddaman

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: I used these in the winter time to walk to work as my feet get very cold when I usually wear pumps. They kept my feet warmer than the shoes I normally wear but they do not look pretty. The cvo leather makes them look quite ugly - maybe in a material version they would look better because I do generally like Keds. Quite disappointed with these as they turned out not to be my style at all so gave them away after all.
customer_reviews.author: penguin246

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always love Keds shoes as they are comfortable and it goes perfectly with jean or working cloth. Very good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise De Lauro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but find that there a little on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality but find that there a little on the big side as they slip off my feet my best fit size is 5.5 these feel more like a 6 though
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: All the classic good looks of our beloved Champion sneaker now in sleek sophisticated and oh-so-soft tumbled leather We lined these leather shoes with soft canvas for breathability and soft insoles for cushy steps
feature_bullets: Leather upper 4 eyelet lace up sneaker Soft breathable lining Dream Foam footbed Flexible textured rubber outsole Care instructions spot wash air dry only
